review: I recently purchased Chromecast due to a favorable review from a friend. It works quite well when I cast Netflix or Youtube videos from my iPhone. However, HuluPlus and Amazon Instant Video are not currently supported (I would give it 5 stars if they were). I haven't seen any significant drainage to my phone battery when using it to cast and I love that I can still check emails/facebook/etc while streaming.The one other complaint that I have is that when casting from by Chrome browser, it tends to be a bit choppy. The audio and video do not always sync perfectly.All in all, if they offer Amazon video and Hulu casting, this will be one of my favorite products out there.
author: Felicia Adams "Book lover"
